title: For the
Impatient
label: D3 Tutorial
description: This tutorial is based on the book 'D3 for the Impatient', from Philipp K. Janert. It's will walk through each chapter showings examples.

title: ntroduction
label: Chapter 01
description: D3 is a javascript library for manipulating Data Object Model (DOM) tree in order to represent information visualy.

title: Let's make some
graphs already
label: Chapter 02
description: This chapter will show how to plot a set of data for coordinates, and double sets (more than one axis). It will show as well how to add scales, and animate elements.
